class.description: A web page that lets [User]s edit their own data / settings. Rendering can be customized by creating the following method: [code]func _render_user_page(request : WebServerRequest, d : Dictionary) -> void:[/code] The [code]d[/code] [Dictionary] will contain the following data: [code]d["user"] = user; d["error_str"] = error_str; String, html containing the problems. d["uname_val"] = uname_val; The username input value. d["email_val"] = email_val; The email input value. d["pass_val"] = pass_val; The password input value. d["pass_check_val"] = pass_check_val; The password check input value.[/code]
